Name: Hassan Magdy
AboutMe:
After spending 5 years on the software industry working at national and international organizations, you can bio Hassan as below:

An enthusiastic and pragmatic software engineer who loves what he does and is always eager to indulge in new challenges, especially on the technical level, He is currently working in xdigitalgroup.com as Senior Web Developer Team Lead and he is preparing his MSc theses, in IGSR - Information Technology Master Program that focus the research on Text Mining and Soft Computing Algorithms.

Hassan graduated from Management Information Systems MIS Department, Faculty of Commerce, Alexandria University, Egypt and then had the Nine Months professional diploma of System developemnt in the Information Technology Institute iTi.

Hassan started as a Junior software engineer in IRange in a dedicated team working for ITWorx, He worked as a Web development instructor for [C#, Asp.Net, PHP, ORM, DAL, Js, JQuery, Dojo] in New Horizons Training Center and Premi√®re Training Center for 4 years.He is also an X-Amazon , he worked as software engineer in Book Depository (owned by Amazon.com).

Hassan is GDG(Google Developer Group) Alexandria Official volunteer speaker on Google Services & Android Programming.
